title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 19, 2026 8:03 PM
content:
# 📊 Market Intel Scanner — February 19, 2026, 8:03 PM EST

**Top Trending**: Bitcoin consolidation near $67K amid crash protection buying • White House stablecoin yield negotiations gain traction • Google launches Gemini 3.1 Pro • U.S. women's hockey team wins Olympic gold in OT thriller • Blockfills liquidation after $75M lending loss

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Bitcoin steadies near $67,000** as traders pay for crash protection — average ETF investor sitting on 20% paper loss, market vulnerable to capitulation selling (CoinDesk)
- **White House stablecoin talks make progress** — latest meetings with banks on yield/rewards, pushing for market structure bill advancement but no deal yet (CoinDesk)
- **Google releases Gemini 3.1 Pro** — major AI model update hitting #1 on Hacker News with 495 upvotes, 680 comments (HN)
- **U.S. women's hockey beats Canada 2-1 in overtime** for Olympic gold — Megan Keller scores game-winner (ESPN)
- **Susquehanna-backed Blockfills up for sale** after $75M lending loss, suspending client deposits/withdrawals (CoinDesk)

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

### Indices & Market Structure
- **NBA plans anti-tanking rules** next season — addressing competitive integrity concerns (ESPN)
- **Indiana passes bill to lure Bears from Chicago** — major stadium/franchise play (ESPN)

### Notable Tickers
- **Bitdeer (BTDR)** — tumbles 17% on $300M convertible note offering, dilution fears (CoinDesk)
- **Figure (FGRD)** — debuting tokenized stock with upsized $150M offering, instant onchain settlement (CoinDesk)
- **Gemini stock** — fell 10% earlier this week after COO/CFO/CLO departures post-IPO (CoinDesk archives)

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

### Bitcoin ($67,269, +0.58%)
- Trading near $67K after volatile week
- 14-day RSI below 30 for only third time ever — suggests months of consolidation around $60K region ahead
- Eric Trump reiterates $1M BTC prediction, acknowledges volatility but says upside outweighs risk
- Mike McGlone softens bearish target to $28K (from $10K) after backlash

### Market Activity
- **UAE sits on $344M unrealized profit** from state-backed bitcoin mining (4 BTC/day production)
- **Bitcoin's fifth weekly decline** — longest losing streak since 2022, geopolitical risks mounting
- **Ethereum ($1,959, +0.43%)** — consolidating with BTC
- **XRP ($1.42, +0.80%)** — SocGen taps XRP Ledger for euro stablecoin distribution
- **Solana ($82.95, +1.23%)** — gaining ground

### Policy & Infrastructure
- **Fed's Neel Kashkari calls crypto "utterly useless"**, dismisses stablecoins as "buzzword salad" (CoinDesk)
- **Fed researchers praise prediction markets** (Kalshi) in new paper, valuable for policymakers (CoinDesk)
- **Trump-linked World Liberty partners with BlackRock-backed Securitize** for Maldives hotel tokenization (CoinDesk)
- **Robinhood testnet L2 logs 4M transactions** — centralized exchanges building own blockchain infrastructure despite Vitalik cooling on rollups (CoinDesk)
- **Anchorage Digital launches stablecoin rails** for international banks, U.S.-compliant correspondent banking alternative (CoinDesk)
- **Illicit stablecoin flows: $141B of $35T volume in 2025** (under 1%), 86% sanctions-related (TRM Labs via CoinDesk)

---

*Note: Bloomberg.com blocked automated access with anti-bot protection. Unable to fetch current headlines.*

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

### r/wallstreetbets
- Community active (3.4M members, 140K online)
- Rules heavily enforce $500M+ market cap minimum, $10K+ YOLO requirement
- Focus on realized gains/losses, anti-pump-and-dump measures
- No specific trending tickers scraped (requires logged-in session for full content)

### r/stocks
- 21.6M members
- Strict rules: no penny stocks, no crypto (except ticker-related like COIN), disclosure requirements
- No spam/self-promotion allowed
- Content requires context and effort

### r/cryptocurrency
- Unable to scrape trending content (login wall)

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

### Olympics (Milan Cortina 2026)
- **U.S. women's hockey defeats Canada 2-1 in OT** — Megan Keller golden goal, thrilling rivalry continues
- **Figure skating: Liu captures elusive gold for U.S.** — rare Olympic women's figure skating win
- **Men's curling: Canada vs. Britain in gold medal game**

### NBA
- **Thunder remain without SGA and Jalen Williams** returning from All-Star break
- **League planning anti-tanking rules** for next season

### NCAA Basketball
- **Auburn's fortunes slide** — fifth straight loss, Bubble Watch concerns
- **Alabama beats Arkansas in double OT** — Malique Ewin misses tying dunk attempt

### NFL Offseason
- **Indiana unanimously passes bill to lure Bears from Chicago** — major stadium incentive play
- **Brewers reward manager Pat Murphy** with 3-year deal
